input_email_body:
Subject: Request for MacBook Air Exchange

Dear Customer Support,

I am writing to request an exchange for a new MacBook Air M1 due to battery charging issues My name is John Doe.. My device, purchased under the account <acc_num>, consistently fails to charge beyond 20% despite several troubleshooting attempts. I would appreciate a swift resolution. Please guide me through the process to ensure a smooth exchange, at my earliest convenience.

Thank you for your assistance.

Sincerely,
<name> You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.
